MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 取得值，指出對集合的存取是否為安全執行緒。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is thread safe.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性永遠傳回`true`，因為一旦建構，該集合為唯讀。This property always returns `true`, because once constructed, the collection is read-only. 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

The current instance of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個實作會傳回目前的執行個體，因為此集合中，建構完成後，不允許對基礎清單的公用存取。This implementation returns the current instance of the , because this collection, once constructed, does not allow public access to the underlying list. 如需有關方法，請參閱屬性。For more information on the method, see the property.

summary.span: 將項目加入至集合。

span.span: Adds an item to the collection.
The position into which the new element was inserted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別會實作介面，它必須有方法。Because the class implements the interface, it must have an method. 不過，因為類別代表唯讀的集合，加入至集合的項目就是無效的作業。However, because the class represents a read-only collection, adding items to the collection is an invalid operation.

span.span: In all cases.

span.span: In all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個集合是唯讀建構完成後，因此，永遠會固定的大小。The collection is read-only once constructed and will, therefore, always have a fixed size.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean Implements IList.IsReadOnly

summary.span: 取得值，表示集合是否為唯讀。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構完成後為唯讀。The is read-only once constructed. 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
